DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the correlation between carbon dioxide measured by capnography at the enf of exhalation and arterial blood in COPD patients with nasal cannula in critical care unit.
DOC.brief_title: Correlation Between Carbon Dioxide Measured in End of Exhalation and Arterial Blood
DOC.criteria: Adults COPD patients Underaged Pregnant Major burns
